tests.name: Publish - Failover
tests.description: Demonstrates failover of browser support for publishing.

tests.name: Publish - 1080p
tests.description: Demonstration of assigning 1080p resolution to publishing.

tests.name: Publish - Camera Source
tests.description: Demonstrates selection of camera source for publishing.

tests.name: Publish - Camera Swap
tests.description: Demonstrates swap of camera in front to rear where supported on device browser.

tests.name: Publish - Image Capture
tests.description: Demonstrates capturing an image of live video.

tests.name: Publish - Stream Manager
tests.description: Demonstrates accessing target origin for broadcast using Stream Manager.

tests.name: Subscribe - Failover
tests.description: Demonstrates failover of browser support for subscribing.

tests.name: Subscribe - Cluster
tests.description: Demonstrates accessing Edge IP from Cluster for subscription.

tests.name: Subscribe - Stream Manager
tests.description: Demonstrates accessing Edge IP from Stream Manager API for subscription.
